name: dfs.default.chunk.view.size
description: The number of bytes to view for a file on the browser.

name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
description:
The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for
  each map task.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.num.attempts
description:
This property is the number of attempts to be made for LDAP operations.
    If this limit is exceeded, LdapGroupsMapping will return an empty
    group list.

name: dfs.namenode.max-corrupt-file-blocks-returned
description:
The maximum number of corrupt file blocks listed by NameNode Web UI,
      JMX and other client request.

name: dfs.namenode.reconstruction.pending.timeout-sec
description:
Timeout in seconds for block reconstruction.  If this value is 0 or less,
    then it will default to 5 minutes.

name: dfs.client.socketcache.capacity
description:
Socket cache capacity (in entries) for short-circuit reads.
    If this value is set to 0, the client socket cache is disabled.

name: dfs.edit.log.transfer.timeout
description:
Socket timeout for edit log transfer in milliseconds. This timeout
    should be configured such that normal edit log transfer for journal
    node syncing can complete successfully.

name: mapreduce.client.submit.file.replication
description:
The replication level for submitted job files.  This
  should be around the square root of the number of nodes.

name: hadoop.kerberos.min.seconds.before.relogin
description:
The minimum time between relogin attempts for Kerberos, in
    seconds.
